ex.reader
Class SimpleTokenizer

java.lang.Object
  ex.reader.Tokenizer
      ex.reader.SimpleTokenizer

public class SimpleTokenizer
extends Tokenizer

A SimpleTokenizer splits input on whitespaces.

This is not meant as a serious tokenizer ;-)
